snippet: The Exxon Mobil Corporation and Kenneth Salazar, the interior secretary, agreed to settle a lawsuit in which Exxon challenged the government’s decision to cancel offshore leases.
abstract: Exxon Mobil Corp and Interior Secretary Kenneth Salazar agree to settle a lawsuit in which Exxon challenged the government’s decision to cancel Gulf of Mexico offshore leases.
lead_paragraph: The Exxon Mobil Corporation and Kenneth Salazar, the interior secretary, agreed to settle a lawsuit in which Exxon challenged the government’s decision to cancel offshore leases.

headline.main: Exxon and Salazar in Settlement on Offshore Leases
headline.print_headline: Exxon And Salazar In Settlement On Offshore Leases
